alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 6:27PM EDT until September 09 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN QUEEN ANNE`S AND NORTHEASTERN KENT COUNTIES... At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Church Hill, or 8 miles north of Centerville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Chestertown, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Sassafras, Old Town, Starkey Corner, Morgnec, Massey, Crumpton, Kennedyville, Galena, Barclay and Kingstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
